ingredients.item: 2 essential Waitrose Peppered Smoked Mackerel Fillets, skinned and boned

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200°C, gas mark 6. Prick the potatoes with a fork and microwave on high for 5 minutes. Transfer to the oven for 30 minutes.
Meanwhile, place the mackerel and yogurt in a food processor and pulse to give a coarse paste.
Microwave the sweetcorn in a bowl covered with clingfilm until piping hot. Halve the potatoes, top with the sweetcorn and mackerel pâté, and sprinkle with chives.
